sentences.en: Acidic water will corrode the pipes.
Acidoresistant: Without corrode in 2.5 % hydrochloric Acid solution at 24 hour.
sentences.cn: 耐酸性: 在2.5%盐酸溶液中浸24小时无明显腐蚀现象.

sentences.en: An acid has the power to corrode metals.
sentences.cn: 酸具有腐蚀金属的性能.

sentences.en: An iron tool, if never used, will corrode with rust.
sentences.cn: 铁制工具长期不用会锈损.

sentences.en: Does not react with or corrode most metals or plastics.
sentences.cn: 纯中性对金属及塑胶件均不会发生反应及产生腐蚀作用.

sentences.en: He has devised a process for making gold wires which neither corrode nor oxidise.
sentences.cn: 他设计了一种能够避免腐蚀或氧化的金丝制作流程。

sentences.en: It must not corrode metal fittings and interact with finish systems.
sentences.cn: 它必须不腐蚀金属装置,不和涂料系统发生互相作用.

sentences.en: It'll corrode the radiator and hoses.
sentences.cn: 它们会腐蚀散热器的软管.

sentences.en: The tools will corrode with rust if never used.
sentences.cn: 这些工具如长期不用会长铁锈而损坏.

sentences.en: This sum of money will be used to clean the corrode spot and pitting.
sentences.cn: 这笔赔偿的坛子将用于清除腐蚀斑痕和麻点.

sentences.en: Though a windstorm may corrode your happiness.
sentences.cn: 尽管暴风雨侵蚀了你的快乐.

sentences.en: Threads can corrode and cause leakage.
sentences.cn: 螺纹可能被腐蚀并导致泄露.

sentences.en: What legacy of land and soul is destined to corrode?
sentences.cn: 灵魂与国土那注定被腐蚀的遗物究竟是 什么 ?

words.tran_cn: 腐蚀；腐蚀产生的物质；衰败

trans.tran_en: if metal corrodes, or if something corrodes it, it is slowly destroyed by the effect of water, chemicals etc
